name: Github Actions Demo
on: [push]
jobs:
  run-github-action:
    runs-on: ubutnu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Greet Action
        id: greet
        uses: /actions/hello-world-javascript-action@v1
        with:
          who-to-greet: 'Mona the Octocat'
      - name: Check output of previous action
        run: echo "${{steps.greet.outputs.time}}"
